name: On Guard
description:
Source: https://github.com/lyze237/On-Guard

Libgdx GameJam entry for June 2020.

Theme was "Towerdefence without towers"

Press "F" to fast forward.

Upgrading units gives +1 to health and damage each.

Special units:

  • Samurais: Phase through units
  • Mages: Ranged attacks
  • Potion: Deals 1 damage to each enemy unit once instantly.

Credits

  • Art specifically created for this game by: @borazilla
  • Sound by: David Stearn
  • Music by: Skytyrannosaur Rex engine

Used tools

  • IDE: Intellij
  • Pixelart editor: Aseprite
  • Map editor: Tiled
  • Game engine: Libgdx
